readable.title: 544301311_5e7d69a517
readable.content: The women sit outside on the steps reading and drinking . Two girls sit by a doorway on the steps . Two women in period dress sitting in a doorway . Two women in traditional European dress sit on a stoop , one drinking , the other reading . Two women with white head garb and long dresses sitting in front of a door on steps reading and drinking a beverage .
